## viewof Inputs.button (OJS)

we use OJS buttons

=\> form class="oi-3a86ea" button **class="btn btn-primary"**

```{=html}
<!--

<style>
  .single-wrapper {
    margin: 2rem 0;
    padding: 1rem;
    border: 2px solid #007acc;
    border-radius: 6px;
    background: #f0f8ff;
  }

  .row-wrapper {
    margin: 2rem 0;
    padding: 1rem;
    border: 2px solid #444;
    border-radius: 6px;
    background: #fafafa;
  }

  .row {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
  }

  .col {
    flex: 1;
  }

</style>

-->  
```

::: single-wrapper
```{ojs}

viewof OjsBtnZero = Inputs.button(".btn.btn-quarto is default");
viewof OjsQuartoRemove = Inputs.button(".btn only");
viewof OjsBtnAdd = Inputs.button(".btn.btn-success added");

restyle = {
 const mibOjsBtnZero = viewof OjsBtnZero.querySelector('.btn.btn-quarto');
  
 const mib = viewof OjsQuartoRemove.querySelector('.btn.btn-quarto');
 if (mib) {
    mib.classList.remove('btn-quarto');
//    mib.classList.add('btn-success');
  }
  
 const addmib = viewof OjsBtnAdd.querySelector('.btn.btn-quarto');
 if (addmib) {
   addmib.classList.remove('btn-quarto');
   addmib.classList.add('btn-success');
  }  
};

```
:::
